content: if you ve been searching for the perfect cozy layering piece meet your new favorite make the solara hoodie a gorgeous crochet hoodie that s as practical as it is stylish this crochet hoodie design was inspired by the kind of days when you want to feel wrapped in comfort whether you re lounging at home taking a cool morning walk or heading out for coffee the solara hoodie delivers warmth texture and that handmade coziness only crochet can offer to make it even better the pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial to guide you step-by-step through the process ✨ pattern includes -16-page beautifully designed written pattern with step by step instructions and lots of photos -full video tutorial to accompany the pattern -fully size inclusive the pattern is written for sizes x-small through 5x-large this pdf crochet pattern is written in english only using us terms sizes this pattern uses worsted weight yarn uses both 5 00mm and 5 50mm crochet hooks or as needed to obtain gauge and is written for sizes xs - 5xl the pattern includes a helpful measurement chart packed with all the measurements you ll need skill level advanced beginner
